text: Isaac Hernández Bolívar (born 9 May 1991 in Medellín) is a Colombian former professional cyclist, who rode professionally between 2011 and 2015. ==Major results== ;2010 :2nd Overall Vuelta de Higuito :3rd Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships ;2011 :1st Stage 6 Vuelta a Colombia U23 :2nd Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships ;2012 :1st Stage 5 Vuelta a Guatemala ;2013 :1st 20px Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships :Pan American Under-23 Road Championships ::2nd Time trial ::3rd Road race ;2014 :3rd Overall Tour de Langkawi ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian male cyclists
title: Isaac Bolívar
